bengaliName: নিভিয়া এক্সপ্রেস হাইড্রেশন বডি লোশন ৪০০ মিলি
longDesc:
Does your skin feel greasy after applying a lotion? You need a non-greasy, ultra-light and fast absorbing body lotion. NIVEA Express Hydration Body Lotion is enriched with sea minerals and Hydra IQ, which work deep within the skin, repairing your dry skin layer by layer to make it soft and supple. External factors like cold weather, exposure to the sun, can be harsh for the skin and cause water loss, but this body lotion keeps your skin hydrated, moisturized and completely nourished. 

The ultra-light formula is perfect for normal skin. Layer it on, just after a bath or just before you step out of the house, the fragrance and effect of the body lotion will be with you all day long. Tip: Use immediately after towel drying your skin to enhance absorption. This Body lotion is free of animal derived ingredients and colorants. Skin compatibility dermatologically approved.
•Absorbs in seconds.
•Leaves your skin soft and supple immediately.
•Formula with Sea Minerals supplies you with moisture all day.
•Extra fast absorption
•Hydra IQ
•24hrs moisture
•Contains sea minerals
name: Nivea Express Hydration Body Lotion 400 ml

bengaliName: নিভিয়া সফ্ট ক্রিম ৫০ মিলি
longDesc:
The best moisture cream for you has to not only work in sync with your skin but also with your lifestyle. There are different types of skin, each with its unique set of needs, but overall there are some skincare ingredients we should all be looking out for.

If your skin tends to get dehydrated, NIVEA Soft is the perfect refreshing moisturising cream. Enriched with Jojoba oil and Vitamin E, NIVEA Soft is an invigorating and fast absorbing moisture cream that refreshes your skin, leaving a unique fragrance and making it smooth, soft, supple and healthy. Use it on your dry hands and chapped feet during the chilled winter days to obtain great results. You can also apply it regularly after your cleansing ritual for smooth, soft skin. With just one application, the cream dissipates into your skin, even in the sweltering heat. 

Keep your skin healthy and happy with the fresh smelling NIVEA Soft moisture cream. Try it, you’ll love it.
•Highly effective, intensive moisturizing cream
•Quickly absorbs and refreshes the skin
•Leaves your skin soft and supple
•For everyday use
•Skin compatibility dermatologically approved
name: Nivea Soft Creme 50 ml

Vaseline intensive care deep restore body lotion is designed to penetrate the outermost layer of the skin to help heal dry skin for long periods of time. Vaseline intensive care deep restore body lotion is formulated glycerine, to restore moisture to the skin, and micro-droplets of Vaseline jelly, which is effective in locking moisturise in skin. Its deeply moisturizing formula provides effective, long-lasting moisturization. Clinically proven to restore dry skin. 
Water, Mineral Oil, Glycerin, Cetostearyl Alcohol, Petrolatum, Avena Sativa (Oat) Straw Extract, Sodium Cetostearyl Sulphate, Glyceryl Stearate, Paraffin, Dimethicone, Microcrystalline Wax, Sodium Carboxy Methyl Cellulose, Methyl Paraben, Phenoxyethanol, Propyl Paraben, Simethicone, Disodium Edta, Soyabean Oil, Bht, Perfume, Alpha-isomethyl Ionone, Amyl Cinnamal, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.
name: Vaseline Lotion Deep Restore 400 ml

longDesc:
The best moisture cream for you has to not only work in sync with your skin but also with your lifestyle. There are different types of skin, each with its unique set of needs, but overall there are some skincare ingredients we should all be looking out for.

If your skin tends to get dehydrated, NIVEA Soft is the perfect refreshing moisturising cream. Enriched with Jojoba oil and Vitamin E, NIVEA Soft is an invigorating and fast absorbing moisture cream that refreshes your skin, leaving a unique fragrance and making it smooth, soft, supple and healthy. Use it on your dry hands and chapped feet during the chilled winter days to obtain great results. You can also apply it regularly after your cleansing ritual for smooth, soft skin. With just one application, the cream dissipates into your skin, even in the sweltering heat. 

Keep your skin healthy and happy with the fresh smelling NIVEA Soft moisture cream. Try it, you’ll love it.
•Highly effective, intensive moisturizing cream
•Quickly absorbs and refreshes the skin
•Leaves your skin soft and supple
•For everyday use
•Skin compatibility dermatologically approved
name: Nivea Soft Creme 100 ml
